findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: There is no access control for the mint() function. Any user can call this function with any amount and mint those tokens to himself. This allows users to get unlimited tokens.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized burning of tokens
findings.description: User A can call the burn() function, passing the address of User B, thus burning the tokens of User B.

findings.title: Missing Events for Significant Transactions
findings.description: The missing event makes it difficult to track off-chain decimal changes.

findings.title: Wrong comments
findings.description: Wrong comments were found for the above code. A misunderstanding comment could influence code readability.

findings.title: Public function that could be declared external
findings.description: The following public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: 'address project' defined as payable
findings.description: The 'address project' variable was unnecessarily defined as payable.
